name: Music revolution
description:
You are a guitarist. Use the power of music to collect fans and create anarchy in a dark themed city with a background evolving through reuse of same assets with slight changes.

Controls:

  • ARROW KEYS : move up and down, along 3 lanes
  • SHIFT : press to slide under a barrier
  • SPACE : press to jump over a barrier/policeman

Gameplay:

  • dodge vehicles/barriers/policemen by changing lane (or you lose fanclub points)
  • increase you fanclub by collecting civilian people facing right
  • watch as the city evolves as you grow your fanclub, until you win

Credits :

  • Peoples / fans sprites : https://panhandler.itch.io/animated-walking-people / https://fr.depositphotos.com/vector-images/pixel-characters.html
  • Publicity sign : https://imgbin.com/png/28SPWegC/sign-of-the-horns-rock-music-heavy-metal-png / https://dribbble.com/shots/2136882-Pixel-Billboard-for-Site
  • Abandoned House:   https://www.kindpng.com/imgv/bRmimo_warehouse-broken-down-broken-building-pixel-... / https://fr.freepik.com/photos-vecteurs-libre/rat-domestique
  • Shop: https://www.pinterest.fr/pin/jonathan-dodd-pixel-art-mdz2-shopping-mall-gif-anim... / https://www.dreamstime.com/illustration/pixel-flame.html
  • Park : https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-green-zone-tileset-pixel-art
  • Statue2 : https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/pixel-art-rock/3
  • Road tiles : https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack
  • Music : Upbeat Indie Rock by Infraction [No Copyright Music] / Holiday

Made by Blatantbeast, with the help of Drakorle
